item.title: Pashupati Cotspin Ltd Hits All-Time High at Rs.855 on 11 Feb 2026
item.description: Pashupati Cotspin Ltd, a key player in the Garments & Apparels sector, reached a new all-time high of Rs.855 today, underscoring a notable phase of strong performance and market resilience. This milestone reflects the company’s sustained upward momentum amid a competitive industry landscape. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Quest Laboratories Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Momentum
item.description: Quest Laboratories Ltd witnessed a remarkable surge on 11 Feb 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit of 20% and closing at ₹129.60. This extraordinary price movement was driven by strong buying interest, significant unfilled demand, and a regulatory freeze on further trading, marking a notable day for the micro-cap pharmaceutical player. Time: 17 minutes ago

item.title: Supreme Power Equipment Ltd Plunges to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Supreme Power Equipment Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Other Electrical Equipment sector, plunged sharply on 11 Feb 2026, hitting the lower circuit limit amid intense selling pressure. Time: 17 minutes ago
